alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:31PM EST until January 28 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... River Raisin At Monroe City affecting Monroe County. For the River Raisin...including Tecumseh, Adrian, Blissfield, Dundee, Monroe City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...River Raisin at Monroe City. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:39 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.8 feet and near steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1115 AM EST.
